article_tables.title: Overview
rows: Type: Offensive PowerCost: $1000Recharge Time: 7:00Launches a Blackout Missile that disables structures and defensesShutdown lasts for 22 secondsLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be targeted near the Cyberkernel)

Type: Utility PowerCost: $1500Recharge Time: 6:30Deploys a Megaarena Projector anywhere on the battlefieldMegalodons near a Megaarena Projector gain a reactive shieldReactive shield increases speed by 1 and grants EMP immunityReactive shield instantly kills infantry except heroesLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be targeted on water)
Type: Utility PowerCost: FreeRecharge Time: 5:30Blocks the use of support powers in a designated area for 120 secondsDoes not block Scout PowersLeft-click icon then left-click on target location
